billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Requires school districts, upon notification from law enforcement agencies, to notify residents of sex offenders living in the district
summary: Requires school districts, upon notification from law enforcement agencies, to notify residents of level two and three sex offenders living in the district; apportions money to school districts for certain sex offender expenses.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to required notification by school districts of sex offender residence; and to amend the education law, in relation to apportionment to school districts for certain expenses related to sex offender notification
